item.title: Ohio City Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland
item.description: Whether you’re a local or a tourist, get to know Cleveland better on a food-focused tour of its coolest neighborhoods. With a small group of like-minded travelers and your foodie guide, start the tour at the West Side Market. Continue to a Mexican restaurant, a brewery, an ice-cream shop, a butcher, and more. Come hungry and enjoy tasty samples at each stop.

image.alt: Ohio City Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland

item.title: Cleveland Ghosts Tour
item.description: See a spookier side of Cleveland, Ohio with the help of a guide to show you around the city and share tales of its (allegedly) ghostly past, from historic battles to the casualties of organized crime. See The Arcade, Pickwick and Frolic Restaurant and Club, Connor Palace, and more as you safely walk the city streets at night with your group.

image.alt: Cleveland Ghosts Tour

item.title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Admission in Cleveland
item.description: Visit the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame during your time in Cleveland, Ohio and see the exhibits at your own pace during your self-guided tour. Musicians in the Hall of Fame include The Beatles, Jimi Hendrix, The Rolling Stones, David Bowie, the Supremes, Metallica, Michael Jackson, and Parliament/Funkadelic.

image.alt: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Admission in Cleveland

item.title: Little Italy Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland
item.description: If a standard history tour does not appeal, combine history with delicious food on this guided tour. Explore Cleveland's Little Italy neighborhood and learn about the Italian culture that has held firm here for generations. Visit some of the area's best restaurants, some long-standing, some newer, and sample such typical dishes as pasta, pizza, and meatballs.

image.alt: Little Italy Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland

item.title: Hidden Sights and Stops of Cleveland
item.description: Explore Cleveland on this combination driving and walking tour. Head off the beaten path and visit some of the city’s hidden gems as well as some of its most popular sights. Highlights of the tour include the house turned museum from “A Christmas Story,” Bridges of the Cleveland Flats, the Cleveland script sign in Edgewater Park, West Side Market, and more.

image.alt: Hidden Sights and Stops of Cleveland

item.title: Tremont Neighborhood Food Tour
item.description: Tremont is a neighborhood of rich history, architecture, and cuisine. But, as a visitor, it can be tricky to choose which of its many great eateries to dine at. This walking tour explores Tremont's cuisine in depth — from its ethnic working class roots to the high-end gastronomic experiences now on offer — as you visit local restaurants to sample their dishes.

image.alt: Tremont Neighborhood Food Tour

item.title: The Best of CLE
item.description: See Cleveland like a local with a guide to drive you around and help you soak up some essential sights. Learn all about Cleveland’s history and cover plenty of ground from a comfortable van. This private tour is perfect for anyone new to the city who wants to get their bearings and see as much as possible without exhausting themselves. Hassle-free pickup from your Cleveland hotel is included.

image.alt: The Best of CLE

item.title: West Side Market Food Tour
item.description: Cleveland's historic West Side Market is so chock-full of colorful vendors that it can feel overwhelming to a first time visitor. This guided tour takes you into the market to visit 15 specially selected vendors to sample their products, from beef jerky, to falafel and apple turnovers, while offering insight into the market's notable history and architecture.

image.alt: West Side Market Food Tour

item.title: Cleveland Comedy City Tour
item.description:
Explore Cleveland's most exciting neighborhoods on this 90-minute bus tour with a comedic spin. As we explore Cleveland, your tour guide (a local comedian) will put a comedic spin on the city's sights, sounds, and history. The jokes you hear on the comedy bus are like those in a comedy club. Guests can bring their own beer or wine. Sit back and enjoy this hilarious, adult-oriented tour and experience all the excitement.
Halfway through the tour, there's a 15-minute beverage and bathroom break.

image.alt: Cleveland Comedy City Tour

item.title: Skip the Line: Cleveland History Center Admission Ticket
item.description: Pre-book your admission ticket to the Cleveland History Center to ensure a hassle-free visit. Bypass the ticket line and spend more of your time checking out such exhibits as the very first map of Cleveland and LeBron James’ championship shoes.

image.alt: Skip the Line: Cleveland History Center Admission Ticket

item.title: 3 Hours E-Bike Rental in Cleveland
item.description:
Our rentals are unique for three reasons: local immersion, hassle-free, and quality.
We immerse renters into Cleveland culture. We rent our e-bikes on Cleveland's most scenic trails (including the Towpath, Lakefront Bikeway, and Redline Greenway) and around Cleveland's trendiest neighborhoods (like Ohio City, Tremont, Gordon Square, the Flats, and Downtown). And we provide local insights into the best stops (restaurants and landmarks) along your ride.
Our rentals are hassle-free because we deliver the e-bike(s) to you at the beginning of your rental, and we pick the e-bike(s) up at the end. If anything goes wrong along the way, we meet you to get you back on your way.
Finally, our rentals are quality. Each rental includes a Lectric XP 3.0 electric bicycle, a helmet, a bike lock, and a trail map with our recommendations on where to visit during your ride.

image.alt: 3 Hours E-Bike Rental in Cleveland

item.title: Smartphone-Guided Walking Tour of Downtown Cleveland Sights & Stories
item.description: Put your walking shoes on and charge your smartphone so you and your group can enjoy this guided walking tour of downtown Cleveland. You’ll just create your account, and the information will be there waiting for you to share with our team. Visit several places today, including the Public Square, Cuyahoga County Soldiers' and Sailors’ Monument, and more to discover what makes Cleveland so special.

image.alt: Smartphone-Guided Walking Tour of Downtown Cleveland Sights & Stories

item.title: Self Guided Scavenger Hunt: Cleveland Culture
item.description: Learn more about Cleveland’s rich culture while having fun with your friends during an app-based scavenger hunt challenge. Download the app to your phone and follow the prompts, taking photos and solving challenges along the way. You’ll visit several of Cleveland’s top art and culture institutions, including the Museum of Art and the Museum of Natural History.

image.alt: Self Guided Scavenger Hunt: Cleveland Culture

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer from Cleveland Airprot (CLE)
item.description: Avoid flagging down taxis or waiting for packed-full airport shuttles, and prebook this Cleveland Hopkins International Airport Private Arrival Transfer. This private airport transfer picks you up at CLE and takes you to your accommodation with just you and your own group. Plus, you can choose from a sedan or van based on your group size.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer from Cleveland Airprot (CLE)

item.title: The Couples Private and Guided Workshop in Cleveland
item.description: For hundreds of years the practice and art of somatics has been mostly a mystery, except for the most devote practitioners. Corissa shares this ancient practice with couples so they can heal, connect, and find more love in their relationship.

image.alt: The Couples Private and Guided Workshop in Cleveland

item.title: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Cleveland by Crazy Dash
item.description: Embark on a self-guided adventure in Cleveland with this app-based scavenger hunt. Grab your group to search for various items and tackle exciting challenges to earn points. Items can be found in any order, and the app rankings will display your score against others. With a remote host offering guidance, this scavenger hunt is flexible and fun.

image.alt: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Cleveland by Crazy Dash

item.title: Sights, Bites, and Stories of CLE
item.description: Check out our selection of stops. Do you love to eat and experience new places? This tour makes stops at local markets, bakeries, and small food stores, offering unique specialties Not only can you shop but you will see popular city sights like Edgewater Park, Playhouse Square, and the city's cultural center, University Circle. (subject to time and places selected) Aladdin’s- Home of the pita, Mediterranean deli, and bakery Farkas Pastry Shoppe-Old world quality European desserts following original recipes Hansa Imports & Brewery-Specializes in imported goodies from Europe Michell’s Ice Cream-Cleveland famous in a former movie theater Great Lakes Brewery Kofie Cafe Brewnuts Asiatown Plaza - Grocery, natural herb retailer, gift shop, restaurants Koko Bakery Tink Holl Vienna Distributing-Famous for its corned beef, hot dogs and deli meats Rumi’s-Mediterranean & Turkish Groceries Corbo’s Muray Hill Market

image.alt: Sights, Bites, and Stories of CLE

item.title: Cleveland Guardians Baseball Game Ticket at Progressive Field
item.description:
The Cleveland Guardians offer one of the most unique and engaging experiences in Major League Baseball, anchored by the vibrant and modern Progressive Field. With incredible views of the Cleveland skyline, the stadium combines the charm of a classic ballpark with the comforts of a contemporary venue. The Guardians have invested in creating a welcoming environment for fans, from interactive fan zones to great food and drink options, making the entire gameday experience fun and accessible.
Cleveland fans are among the most passionate and dedicated in baseball, and the city’s unique sports culture elevates the experience of attending a Guardians game. With a fanbase that is fiercely loyal and always ready to cheer on their team, the energy at Progressive Field is contagious. Whether it's a nail-biting late-inning rally or a walk-off win, the Guardians have a knack for dramatic moments that keep the crowd on its feet. A trip to Progressive Field to see the Guardians is not to be missed!

image.alt: Cleveland Guardians Baseball Game Ticket at Progressive Field

item.title: Private Departure Transfer to Cleveland Airport (CLE)
item.description: Relying on public transport to get to the airport can be stressful where there’s no room for baggage or a lot of passengers. Instead, make your ride to Cleveland Airport a breeze with this prebooked private transfer service. Pick a date and time to suit your flight schedule and travel with ease in a comfortable private vehicle.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer to Cleveland Airport (CLE)

item.title: Self-Guided Akron Scavenger Hunt: Burn Rubber Round Akron
item.description: Unlock the secrets of Akron, Ohio while you explore the city on a playful and interactive scavenger hunt. Using the scavenger hunt’s smartphone app, you’ll navigate the town known as the Rubber Capital of the World while you visit landmarks, solve puzzles, and take pictures to complete your quest. Play alone or with a group, a scavenger hunt is a fun way for players of all ages to get to know Akron.

image.alt: Self-Guided Akron Scavenger Hunt: Burn Rubber Round Akron

item.title: CLE Airport Transfer to Downtown Cleveland
item.description: Whether you’re traveling for business or leisure, this private chauffeur service will make sure your arrival in Cleveland goes without a glitch. Your driver will track your flight to make sure they’re at Cleveland Hopkins International Airport in good time for your flight. They will meet you outside, not in the arrivals area, and transport you smoothly to your accommodation in downtown Cleveland.

image.alt: CLE Airport Transfer to Downtown Cleveland

item.title: Heritage Walk: Scenic Guided Tour of Cleveland
item.description: Discover the highlights and greenery of Cuyahoga Valley National Park, right on Cleveland’s doorstep—and enjoy a personalized sightseeing experience—on this private tour. Choose from a range of convenient start times, meet your guide in central Cleveland, and head directly to the park. You’ll view the thundering Brandywine Falls, will walk the Stanford Trail, will see the visitor’s center, and will learn about the region’s history from your guide.

image.alt: Heritage Walk: Scenic Guided Tour of Cleveland

item.title: Cuyahoga Valley National Park Audio Tour Guide
item.description:
Explore the magic of Cuyahoga Valley National Park! Begin with a scenic train ride, witnessing nature's beauty unfold. Discover Brandywine Falls, feel the mist and capture family photos at this enchanting waterfall.
Bike through winding trails, enjoying the park's scenic wonders. Immerse yourself in the vibrant Stan Hywet Hall and Gardens, exploring intricate landscapes and learning about the estate's rich history.
Tune into nature's symphony – the rustle of leaves, babbling brooks, and birdsong. Engage in interactive games, bringing the park's wildlife to life for a fun experience.
End your day with a breathtaking sunset, casting warm colors over the park. Whether by train, bike, or on foot, our tour lets you explore Cuyahoga Valley National Park at your own pace.
*Download the Shaka Guide app to access your purchased tours.*

image.alt: Cuyahoga Valley National Park Audio Tour Guide

item.title: Cleveland to Cleveland Hopkins Airport (CLE) - Departure Private Transfer
item.description: Swap the hassle of navigating public transport or waiting for a taxi to show up for a private transfer from Cleveland to the airport. Simply co-ordinate your desired pickup time and meet your driver at your door. In a clean, comfortable vehicle, you'll be swiftly transported to Cleveland Hopkins Airport in time for your flight.

image.alt: Cleveland to Cleveland Hopkins Airport (CLE) - Departure Private Transfer
